item.title: A Year in Moments: 2023 Video Blog
item.description: Throughout the year, I captured short video clips documenting my travels, adventures, and life events using my camera. For summaries of my 2023 photos, please check out:  jerrysmd.github.io/gallery And to read recaps of the books I enjoyed in 2023:  jerrysmd.notion.site

item.title: Chart of Ionizing Radiation Doses Absorbed by Individuals
item.description: This is a chart of the ionizing radiation dose a person can absorb from various sources. The unit for absorbed dose is “Sievert” (Sv), and measures the effect a dose of radiation will have on the cells of the body. One sievert (all at once) will make you sick, and too many more will kill you, but we safely absorb small amounts of natural radiation daily.

item.title: A Year in Moments: 2022 Video Blog
Book Summary: Nonviolent Communication
item.description: Nonviolent Communication is about connecting with ourselves and others from the heart. It’s about seeing the humanity in all of us. It’s about recognizing our commonalities and differences and finding ways to make life wonderful for all of us.
